Package software.leonov.common.io

Utility methods and classes for working with Files, Writers, Readers, Streams, and ZipFiles.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileWalker<R>
    An implementation of this interface is provided to the walkFileTree methods.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ByteBufferInputStream
    An InputStream which reads bytes from a ByteBuffer.
    ByteBufferSource
    A readable source of bytes from a ByteBuffer.
    ByteStream
    A utility class useful for working with byte streams.
    CharStream
    Static utility methods for working with character streams.
    FileFilters
    Static utility methods pertaining to FileFilters.
    Fs
    Static utility methods for working with Files and Paths.
    MappedFileInputStream
    An InputStream backed by one or more MappedByteBuffers.
    MappedFileSource
    A readable source of bytes from one or more MappedByteBuffers backed by a file.
    SimpleFileWalker<R>
    A basic implementation of FileWalker which visits all files and directories, rethrows any IOExceptions, and returns a null result.
    URLResources
    Static utility methods for working with resources on the classpath.
    Zip
    Static utility methods useful for working with ZipFiles and ZipOutputStreams.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FileWalker.VisitResult
    The result type of a FileWalker.
